attributes.action: Say no to the RFID implantable microchip and the dna database
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: theses chips are already in our passports and used by several companies in their products,it can be used to track any object or person 24/7,the implantable version is about twice the size of a grain of rice and is implanted just under the skin,it will store every piece of infomation about you from medical history to bank details and your whereabouts,this information will be stored on the govt's huge dna database,stop the policestate 1984 is here and orwell is rolling in his grave
